
The texture class represents a source of renderable pixels which can be used as an image with [[/dxDrawImage.md|dxDrawImage]], [[/dxDrawImageSection.md|dxDrawImageSection]] or as a value in [[/dxSetShaderValue.md|dxSetShaderValue]].

The element type of this class is '''"texture"'''.


Texture elements are created by the following functions:
* [[/dxCreateTexture.md|dxCreateTexture]]
* [[/dxCreateRenderTarget.md|dxCreateRenderTarget]]
* [[/dxCreateScreenSource.md|dxCreateScreenSource]]
